rock monster.name: Rock Monster
rock monster.alive_msg: You've disturbed a rock monster from his slumber!
rock monster.dead_msg: Defeated, the monster has reverted into an ordinary rock.

colony of bats.name: Colony of Bats
colony of bats.alive_msg: You hear a squeaking noise growing louder... Suddenly you are lost in a swarm if bats!
colony of bats.dead_msg: Dozens of dead bats are scattered on the ground.

gruesome spider.name: Gruesome Spider
gruesome spider.alive_msg: A gruesome spider jumps down from its web in front of you!
gruesome spider.dead_msg: The corpse of a dead spider rots on the ground.

skeleton.name: Skeleton
skeleton.alive_msg: Suddenly bones coming flying toward you. A erie looking skeletal starts running toward you!
skeleton.dead_msg: A collection of bones cover the ground

orc.name: Orc
orc.alive_msg: An ork is blocking your path!
orc.dead_msg: A dead ork reminds you of your triumph.
